description: The Liletta necklace is hands down our most beautiful necklace. The go-anywhere, do-anything vintage revival piece is big enough to layer atop sweaters and sleek enough to wear bare chested for evenings out.  Liletta is the same shape as our Clarette necklace but with over 400 pave stones she is truly a timeless piece to own forever.
